widgets.name: Select One - Radio
widgets.script:
<ng-include src="'vkf-label.html'"></ng-include>
<label class="radio" ng-repeat="option in field.options" ng-if="portletData.preferences.isEditable">
    <input class="field input-block-level"
           type="radio"
           ng-model="aux.fieldValue"
           ng-value="option.value"
           ng-class="{'error-field':formFieldRef.$invalid && formFieldRef.show}"
           ng-required="field.isRequired"
           ng-readonly="portletData.preferences.isEditable"
           ng-attr-id="{{field.pathAsId}}"
           ng-attr-name="{{field.pathAsId}}"/>
    {{option.label}}
</label>
<label ng-if="!portletData.preferences.isEditable"
       ng-repeat="option in field.options | filter:aux.fieldValue">{{option.label}}</label>
widgets.angularTemplate:
<script type="text/ng-template" id="vkf-564509613004f1b48258c060-selectOneRadio.html">
<ng-include src="'vkf-label.html'"></ng-include>
<label class="radio" ng-repeat="option in field.options" ng-if="portletData.preferences.isEditable">
    <input class="field input-block-level"
           type="radio"
           ng-model="aux.fieldValue"
           ng-value="option.value"
           ng-class="{'error-field':formFieldRef.$invalid && formFieldRef.show}"
           ng-required="field.isRequired"
           ng-readonly="portletData.preferences.isEditable"
           ng-attr-id="{{field.pathAsId}}"
           ng-attr-name="{{field.pathAsId}}"/>
    {{option.label}}
</label>
<label ng-if="!portletData.preferences.isEditable"
       ng-repeat="option in field.options | filter:aux.fieldValue">{{option.label}}</label>
</script>
